import React, {useEffect} from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' const Cart = props => { const products = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('cart')); useEffect(() => { loadProduct(); window.scrollTo(0, 0) }, []); return (
{products.map((product, index) => ( ))}

Enter your coupon code if you have one.
